author: cnbc.com
title: M Split Corp.: Monthly Dividend Declared Class I Preferred Shares
text:
M Split Corp. ("M Split") declares its monthly distribution of $0.03125 per share ($0.375 annually) for Class I Preferred shareholders. The Class I Preferred share dividends are paid at an annual rate of 7.50% based on the $5 notional issue price.
M Split invests in common shares of Manulife Financial Corporation, the largest life insurer in Canada offering financial products and wealth management services.
Distribution Details Class I Preferred Share (XMF.PR.B) $0.03125
Local: 416-304-4443
